title: The Bongles - Pet Washing Machine
description: The Bongles series explores the world of the magical Bongle Planet with its colourful bouncy creatures and delivers a green environment message presented in an offbeat and fun way.In this story, a washing machine washes up on shore. Bubba climbs in and gets stuck on the spin cycle and Brainy comes to the rescue. After endless tinkering, he turns the washing machine into a Pet Robot for Bubba. The first thing Pet sees is the adoring eyes of Bubba and thinks Bubba is his dad. Pet follows Bubba everywhere. When Bubba goes for a swim, Pet joins but nearly downs. Bubba saves Pet and the two have now bonded for life.
author: Oscar Van Heek
